author: Daaku Rei
comment: Decent design, doesn't show weather

author: James Hedrick
comment: Love it

author: Roy Portillo
comment: It does drain the battery more than the other faces. Maybe becuase there's so much going on idk. I like the watch face but.... Battery drain
title: Everything is good but the battery life

author: Des Lyttle
comment: I have quite a few watch faces but keep coming back to this one especially since the battery life was improved. You guys make the best watch faces with lots of settings options.

author: Mike McGarry
comment: Looks nice but kills the battery life.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank  you for your feedback.
Could you please send us your situation in detail?
Thank you.

author: Andrew Piland
comment: Looks cool but terrible battery usage

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I'd like to check and try to improve the battery consumption.
For more question ,please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

author: Lori Hanson
comment: Best watch face ever! Love it!!!

author: Tommi Toivanen
comment: Nice desing but extreme battery hog. Just like 90% other this dev faces. Dev need to resolve this battery problem!

author: David Plant
comment: Does not show phone battery level of my Nexus 5.
title: Does not detect phone battery level

author: Kris Hook
comment: Oldskool modern.
title: Awesome

author: Nev Shepard
comment: This is a nice watch face. But it is a battery hog and the latest update doesn't make it any better. It's now sluggish and takes too long to appear on screen when flipping your wrist. Please fix.
title: Latest update ruined it.

author: Shwan Sharif
comment: As others have noted, this is a nice looking watchface, but the negative effect on battery is quite apparent.  I have changed the weather update interval from 20 min (default) to 1 hour, hoping for a difference, but I still lose an extra 20-30 percent of my watch battery throughout the day.
title: Looks nice, bad on battery.

author: Matt Koppelman
comment: I want my money back
title: Broken after wear update

author: Sascha Ferda
comment: Nice creative content and design. Takes too long to completely draw /refresh.
title: Too slow

author: Scott Bird
comment: Your faces are some of the best out there but weather info on all of them is completely inaccurate

author: Rodrigo Allegretti
comment: Great design!

author: Pete Arnold
comment: 1.  Make battery life better. It's a hog.  depletes battery 2x faster then V02 so far... probably not q00% accurate test but consistently poor battery compared to other reviewers.  (That's all it will take foe 5 stars)  2.an option to replace wind speed with your current speed would be sweet.
title: Great face.  My suggestions for updating it...

author: Robert Zablocki
comment: Still destroys my watch battery. I can get twenty hours with other faces. With this one less than twelve. I like the look and the info, but it's not worth the drain.
title: Kills battery

author: Erick Larson
comment: Weather auto locator does not work at all. Even when using fixed location the weather data doesn't display until well after you tether the watch to your phone. Even using 20 minute weather push it took over an hour before the watch face displayed weather data. Weird. Battery hog. Using moto 360 and Sony xperia ultra.
title: Pretty but flawed

author: Josh Hartman
comment: Face used to FC but Dev updated, fairly quickly at that, now working again!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app available for Android Wear 5.0 firmware.
Would you please check the update.Thank you.

title: Now working on 5.0.1 android wear update

author: Big Herc
comment: It is really tough for me to change faces after using this one.
title: Awesome!!!

author: TOMMY L
comment: Usable info and interface with options. Good work.
title: Great looking app

author: Joshua Burris
comment: Best watch face for the 360, period. I must have the updated version because battery life seems fine. I only want two things out of it, and then I'll gladly pay $4.99. 1 - Update the phone app to allow custom colors / hues. 2 - make that compass functional.
title: Love it...but

author: Brandon Rogers
comment: Excellent implementation. .. love the watch face... EDIT: beautifully designed watch, love ever detail and design point, but it is a complete battery hog, it will suck your watch dry!.... update, battery is better, but it is still a HUGE drain on power
title: Well done

author: Lex Len
comment: If you adjust the weather update time to one hour, turn off ambient mode and change the time the device stays on from 15 sec to default you get decent battery life. Getting about 10 hours.
title: Great face

author: John Kittleson
comment: This app needs updating so it doesn't eat battery. More options for stand by times. By default it stays on for 15 seconds. Then it hemorages battery  power even on default off time. I can barely get 4 hours out of my device with it.
title: DON'T BUY 20% drain an hour

author: Montu Timbalia
comment: The update did improve the battery live a little, but it does drain the battery quicker than other watch faces that this dev.has made. Also the alignment of the compass is on the edge of the watch which you can't really see well..
title: Drains battery still

author: Ian Tilley
comment: Love it, one of my favourite watch faces. Seems to drain the battery a bit, but its good looks allow me to forgive it...
title: Very nice

author: omar faruque
comment: First of all this is an awesome face but the issue is that it absolutely kills battery as the comments before have said. Its cool if you only use the watch for like 8 hours or so after that it jumps down to around 15%-20% and I'm not a heavy user.

author: John Cameron
comment: This kills the battery.
title: Looks great but..

author: David Noctor
comment: Great watchface but bit heavy on battery.

author: Ern Mac
comment: I love this watch face.   Really neat features and clean.   Thank you.
title: Awesome

author: PJ Saad
comment: Brilliant!

author: Matt Dade
comment: First off, I LOVE this watch face... It looks awesome and is what I want... Why 2 stars? It's a battery killer, and I think this has something to do with the weather trying to constantly update. Fix this and easy 5 stars!
title: So close to perfection

author: Christopher Kenison
comment: Battery life using this face is way less.
title: Battery killer

author: Navality Life & Tech
comment: Pretty hard to beat
title: Amazing face

author: David Cook
comment: I really like the dual battery levels. Also this looks great on the low res moto360 display
title: Great

author: Jeff Meddemmen
comment: My favourite 360 watchface

author: Jonathan Minnick
comment: Great face for moto 360, but battery life makes the device almost useless and the compass is just for show even though the 360 should have the capability to make it live. Also, it would be great to switch out useless info like wind speed for something like heart rate.
title: Awesome face

author: Matthew Jay Hopkins
comment: The layout design of this watch face is simply the best out. I'm just not a fan of the color scheme. If you enabled the ability to adjust individual hues of elements (with a slider or number value), this app would be taken over the edge. Possibly justify a price bump.  Or release it as a 2.0. Definitely eats battery also. But I see you're working on that daily. Updates are consistent, just no additional controls given...

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. I've updated the app.Would you please the latest version.

title: On the verge of phenomenal
